line_1: 'Tis time the foaming courser to release.
line_2: But here my labours cease:

line_1: For better purpose shall Our Chief release,
line_2: Disguise her for a time, and call her PEACE.

line_1: And did the tender, captive frame release;
line_2: In notes more grateful than the whisp'ring breeze.

line_1: When Death, at last, to either gave Release,
line_2: Making One's Pains, the Other's Longings cease;

line_1: And fear'd that sad release.
line_2: "My EDWIN talk'd of peace;

line_1: And give the full-grown Eggs their ripe Release,
line_2: Oviparous Fish, whom vernal Labours ease,

line_1: Again, when all's secure, the Womb release,
line_2: Force out their Way, and venture on the Seas.

line_1: No friendly Gap affords a kind Release;
line_2: As well they might the fruitless Labour cease,

line_1: When fed the weary Dolphin they release;
line_2: Disperse themselves, and drive along the Seas.

line_1: For so, his sick'ning spirits to release,
line_2: They pour'd the balm of visionary peace.

line_1: The sickening heart thy powers release,
line_2: Let former days return to bless,

line_1: Struggles hard to procure its release.
line_2: Let us silently sit at our ease,

line_1: 'Till pitying Nature signs the last release,
line_2: And bids afflicted worth retire to peace.

line_1: " And fear'd that sad release.
line_2: " My EDWIN talk'd of peace,

line_1: " From Vanity he has a full Release;
line_2: " The Tooth of Avarice poisons not his Peace;

line_1: " From Vanity he has a full Release;
line_2: "And, rich in Nature's Wealth, he thinks not of Increase.

line_1: Ev'n those whom Death stood ready to release,
line_2: Blest the Deliverer, and dy'd in Peace.

line_1: From Years of Pain, one Moment of Release;
line_2: A Shadow of Delight, a Dream of Peace,

line_1: The hand that can my captive heart release
line_2: And to this bosom give its wonted peace,

line_1: Struggles hard to procure its release.
line_2: Let us silently sit at our ease,

line_1: Your Potent Mercy may release:
line_2: Fair Prophetess, my Grief would cease.
